amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part C of House Report 117-325 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 14, 15, 16, 17, 19, 20, 22, 23, 24, 29, 31, 33, 34, 35, 37, 38, and 39.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised of amendments numbered 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 14, 15, 16, 17, 19, 20, 22, 23, 24, 29, 31, 33, 34, 35, 37, 38, and 39, printed in Part C of House Report 117-325.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 196 (Roll no. 189).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
